duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute the company’s strategic financial plan and manage relationships with key stakeholders.
Regularly report to the Board of Directors on strategic insights, M&A opportunities, and overall financial operations.
Model and evaluate potential acquisition opportunities and execute on operational goals.
Strategically guide the CEO and private equity firm in the right financial direction.
Oversee all cash accounts and cash flow forecasting and coordinate with external auditors for annual audits.
Manage the day-to-day finance operations, including FP&A, corporate strategy, treasury, accounting, financial reporting, and tax planning.
Work with senior leadership on building, scaling, and leading a finance team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (Master’s preferred) in Finance, Economics, Business, or related field. Must have worked directly for a private equity firm.
